|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "LPCY0008 V1.7" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The default settings for the REC10 are per '''Amped''''s manual. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.ampedwireless.com/datasheets/support/REC10_UsersGuide_LR.pdf User's Guide]
